title: ElectroNet build doesn't work in .Net core with angular
Add support for Electron's app `login` event for proxies that require user:pass authentication
Add ability to pass an argument for "Version" for both the "dotnet publish" and "electron-builder" commands
electronize doesn't add `version` or `description` to the package.json it uses in a build.
Interacting with the Splash Screen causes WebApp to exit before reaching main browser window
